summary: This file defines a Vue component for a floating button that appears on the page when the user scrolls down. Clicking the button opens the user's default email client with a pre-filled email.
functionality: The component listens for scroll events to determine when to show the floating button. When clicked, it constructs a mailto link and opens the user's default email client with a pre-filled email.
relationships: This component might be used in various parts of the project where a contact or feedback mechanism is needed.
It uses a mail icon from an asset file, indicating a dependency on the project's asset management.
The component's styling is scoped and uses variables from a main.scss file, suggesting a consistent design system across the project.

identified_relationships.description: The FloatingButton component is likely referenced in the index.html file to be included in the main application.
The FloatingButton component may use Tailwind CSS classes defined in the tailwind.config.js file for styling.
The FloatingButton component is likely built and served by the Vite build tool configured in vite.config.js.
